chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall d0 d1 : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d0 -> DTA_main_state_correct d1 -> DTA_main_state_correct (inter d0 d1)

Premises:
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
DTA_main_state_correct = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end : DTA -> Prop
inter = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
DTA_inter_ref_ok_invar : forall d0 d1 : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d0 -> DTA_ref_ok d1 -> DTA_ref_ok (inter d0 d1)
inter_semantics_0 : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (t : term), dta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnait d0 t /\ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (inter d0 d1) t
dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1
inter_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (inter d0 d1) sigma
inter_semantics : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature) (t : term), dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> reconnait d0 t /\ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (inter d0 d1) t
preDTA_produit_ref_ok : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> preDTA_ref_ok (preDTA_produit d0 d1)
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
preDTA_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_produit d0 d1) sigma
predta_inter_direct : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t
predta_inter_reciproque : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t
DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true
DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_r a1 s1 (M2 state s00 s01) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => M2 state (M2 state (preDTA_produit s00 s10) (...
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
OrdersTac.ord_ind : forall P : OrdersTac.ord -> Prop, P OrdersTac.OEQ -> P OrdersTac.OLT -> P OrdersTac.OLE -> forall o : OrdersTac.ord, P o
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
ltof : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> A -> A -> Prop
MapPut1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> ad -> A -> positive -> Map A
ssrfun.right_loop : forall S T : Type, (T -> T) -> (S -> T -> S) -> Prop
